articles.description: Employees will be on the job at Cub Foods stores in the Twin Cities this weekend after reaching a tentative contract agreement.
articles.content: A Cub strike set to begin at 5:30 a.m. Friday ahead of an expectedly busy holiday shopping weekend is no more after union leaders reached a historic labor agreement shortly after midnight for 3,000 w… [+3280 chars]
